"A.P.242/3/14": "Oh, <%me>. Hello!"
"Have you heard of the new class, Etoile?"
"It's another new class like the Hero and Phantom we represent."
"Hmph, \"Etoile\"? That word means \"Star\"."
"One who glitters brilliantly above the sky...? Their representative must have exceptional confidence in themself."
"I wonder what they're like. I wanna try and talk to them, as a fellow representative, but..."
"The instant they sense our presence, they flee. They are quite skilled, to evade my grasp."
"Hm... Or perhaps, they have some reason to avoid us."
"But we've never even met them before... <%me>, do you know them?"
"You mean Lucotte?"
"I have met them, actually."
"Oh... so you have? What was their name?"
"Huh?! Their name is Lucotte?!"
"B-But that's... Lucotte... Luco is... That's our missing friend!"
"Preposterous...! She died long ago! It must be someone else!"

"There had to be some reason!
<%me>... Can you take us to meet them?"
"Foolishness... Nothing good will come of it."
"He might feel that way, but I never gave up hope that she was alive..."
"<%me>. Please, take me to meet her."
